member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TreeMap.SummaryBase
member.summary: This class is an abstract class that defines the necessary functionality to do tablix calculations.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TreeMap.SummaryBase.Combine(System.Object)
member.summary: Use this method to combine a value from an object in the Tablix Grid's data source with the accumulation values held in this instance.
member.param: The value to be included in the compuation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TreeMap.SummaryBase.Reset
member.summary: Resets all internal values so the calculations begins anew.
